plot: A news cameraman covering the Haiti earthquake must choose between doing his job and helping the victims he encounters. Inspired by the writer/director's personal involvement with the Haitian relief effort right after the earthquake.
title: Eyes to See
plot_es: A news cameraman covering the Haiti earthquake must choose between doing his job and helping the victims he encounters. Inspired by the writer/director's personal involvement with the Haitian relief effort right after the earthquake.
plot_en: A news cameraman covering the Haiti earthquake must choose between doing his job and helping the victims he encounters. Inspired by the writer/director's personal involvement with the Haitian relief effort right after the earthquake.
